text: we are delighted to open this festival
with Alan Aldous dear Albert who is he
as I pour over his letters and study
snapshots of his early years he doesn't
seem like the Albert I thought I knew I
have to have someone to love otherwise
life is miserable and this someone is
you
let me categorically assure you that I
consider myself a full-fledged male
perhaps i will sometime have the
opportunity to prove it kisses from your
Albert and I must ask you even if that
were the case would you still love me
I am very starved for love and would be
so overjoyed to hear a yes last summer
you said again and again Oh as far as
Elsa is concerned you know I really am
NOT going to marry again I would be
sorry indeed if even the second time you
did not find the happiness you seek in a
row I had a good idea for investigating
the way in which a body's relative
motion with respect to the luminiferous
ether affects the velocity of the
propagation of light and transparent
bodies take care of yourself
you
